title: Large-Scale Culturally Inclusive Instructional Design Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic instructional design and multicultural education concepts
context.additional_context: Learners engage flexibly with microlearning modules accessible via mobile devices, receiving continuous feedback through formative assessments. Case-based learning reflects the social context requirements of vocational training institutions.

learning_goals: They can distinguish and explain the five sub-elements of cultural inclusivity measurement tools: fairness, diversity reflection, cultural engagement, consideration of social context, and assessment fairness.
They can design and evaluate microlearning content applying cultural inclusivity metrics in mobile learning environments.
They can diagnose and propose improvements for educational materials using a 7-point Likert scale-based cultural inclusivity measurement tool.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
